turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello, how are you doing this afternoon?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Hi! Good thanks, how about you?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I am doing great. Thanks for asking.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I don't know if you have finished reading about the task, but it has something to do with charity.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I would like talk with you about a very important charity called Save the Children. Have you ever heard of them?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: No, unfortunately I haven't. Do you know much about them?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Save the Children is an amazing organization that strives to help children in different areas, such as, healthcare, education, and safety. They not only help children in the United States, they are also making a difference all over the world. Donations that are giving to the company is strictly used to help the children with their needs. They are well known and trusted all over the world.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Oh nice! I don't suppose you know what % of donations actually go to the children?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: 86% goes to program services, 9% fundraising, and 5% management and general

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Oh, that's pretty good. Sorry for all the questions, but I like to look at how effecient charities are so I can get a better sense of them!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That is fine, I want you to be sure that your money is going directly to help the children, and not to fatten someones pocket. I would also like to point out that in 2017 alone, Save the Children help 155 million children in 120 Countries and 237 thousand US children in 22 states and Peurto Rico. They are an outstanding organization thats what to see every child reach their dreams and live a full healthy life.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yeah, that's exactly it. Oh so Save the Children is actually a really large organization. I'm surprised I never heard of it.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: They are well known and loved by many people all over the world. Yet, in order for them to continue helping children, they need people that are willing to think about the needs of children who greatly need help. You could be a hero in a child's life by donating to Save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I usually don't donate unless I do a little more research into an organization, but if all you said is correct, I think I must just donate. So am I allowed to contribute my HIT proceeds? It's only $0.30, but I guess it's better than nothing!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Absolutely!! Anything that you are able to donate would make a major difference in a child's life. Thank you so much for caring about the children that so many have forgotten!!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: No problem. Sorry, it isn't much but i guess there are worse ways to spend your money Friday night!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Your donation is plenty and will save a child! You are an amazing person! Welcome to the Save the Children family!!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thanks for introducing me to the charity. It sounds like a really good organization. So, do you have a link I need to follow to donate, or is that provided after the chat?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I don't see a link, so I am sure you will find one after the chat

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Okay, sounds good. I'll donate my hard earned $0.30 then! Thanks again and have a great weekend!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thank you, from all the children!
